description: Land Acquisition - Redemption Notices for the Lands in Lulbadduwa, Walallawita D/S Division, Kalutara District - Cancellation of the Redemption Notice for the Land in Nilaweli, Kaddukulampattu East (Kuchchaweli) D/S Division, Trincomalee District - Amendment to the Notice of Order No. 86 of 2013 published in Gaz.
